posts.title: Getting Started with Amazon FBA
posts.description: A comprehensive guide for beginners starting their Amazon FBA journey
posts.author: Wesley Quintero
posts.content:
# Getting Started with Amazon FBA

## Understanding the Basics

- Comprehensive overview of FBA program benefits
- Step-by-step guide to account setup
- Product selection criteria and validation
- Initial investment considerations

## Inventory Management

- Optimal inventory levels calculation
- Storage fee optimization strategies
- Seasonal inventory planning
- Reorder point determination

posts.title: A Complete Guide to Next.js Metadata API
posts.description: Learn how to leverage Next.js Metadata API for better SEO and social sharing with practical examples and best practices.
posts.author: Wesley Quintero
posts.content:
# A Complete Guide to Next.js Metadata API

Next.js provides a powerful Metadata API that allows you to define metadata for your application in a declarative way. This guide will walk you through the essential concepts and show you how to implement metadata effectively in your Next.js applications.
